_comment: Example configuration file for Ajna Vault deployment

_documentation.pool: Address of the Ajna pool contract
_documentation.asset: Address of the quote token (must match pool's quote token)
_documentation.name: Human-readable name for the vault token
_documentation.symbol: Symbol for the vault token (typically 3-5 characters)
_documentation.admin: Address that will have admin privileges (defaults to deployer)
_documentation.keepers: Array of addresses that can manage liquidity
_documentation.depositCap: Maximum total deposits in wei (0 = unlimited)
_documentation.bufferRatio: Target buffer percentage in basis points (1000 = 10%)
_documentation.minBucketIndex: Minimum bucket index for keeper operations (0 = no limit)

name: sUSDe-DAI Ajna Vault
